attributes.action: For Existing Care Workers Keep 5-year ILR and Apply New Rules To New Migrants
attributes.additional_details: Applying the new rules retrospectively to individuals who had already been granted leave was unfair and unlawful.
attributes.background: For skilled care workers already residing in the country, new regulations should not be applied. A commitment was made to them regarding a five-year Indefinite Leave to Remain, and new rules should not be implemented retrospectively.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Keep 5-year ILR for Health and Care visa holders to protect the NHS
